title: Automating question generation from educational text. (arXiv:2309.15004v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: The use of question-based activities (QBAs) is wide-spread in education, traditionally forming an integral part of the learning and assessment process. In this paper, we design and evaluate an automated question generation tool for formative and summative assessment in schools. We present an expert survey of one hundred and four teachers, demonstrating the need for automated generation of QBAs, as a tool that can significantly reduce the workload of teachers and facilitate personalized learning experiences. Leveraging the recent advancements in generative AI, we then present a modular framework employing transformer based language models for automatic generation of multiple-choice questions (MCQs) from textual content. translated_title: 从教育文本中自动生成问题
translated_abstract: 问题式活动（QBA）在教育中得到广泛应用，传统上是学习和评估过程的一个重要组成部分。本文设计并评估了一个用于学校形成性和总结性评估的自动化问题生成工具。通过对104名教师的专家调查，我们展示了自动化生成QBA的需求，作为一个能够显著减轻教师工作量并促进个性化学习体验的工具。利用生成型AI的最新进展，我们提出了一个基于Transformer的语言模型的模块化框架，用于从文本内容中自动生成多项选择题（MCQ）。所提出的解决方案具有问题生成、正确答案预测和干扰项制定的不同模块，使我们能够评估不同的语言模型和生成技术。最后，我们进行了广泛的定量和定性评估。
tldr: 本文设计并评估了一个用于学校形成性和总结性评估的自动化问题生成工具，通过对教师的调查，证明了自动化生成问题的需求，并提出了一个基于Transformer的语言模型的模块化框架，用于从文本内容中自动生成多项选择题。
en_tdlr: This paper designs and evaluates an automated question generation tool for formative and summative assessment in schools. It demonstrates the need for automated generation of questions through a survey of teachers and presents a modular framework based on Transformer language models for generating multiple-choice questions from textual content.
